str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pros and phoneo; to sound towards, i.e. Address, exclaim, summon.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The Hebrew language, or rather: Aramaic. From Eber; the Hebraistic or Jewish language.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and echo; to hold near, i.e. Present, afford, exhibit, furnish occasion.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.
Quietness, stillness, silence. Feminine of hesuchios; stillness, i.e. Desistance from bustle or language.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To say, declare. Properly, the same as the base of phos and phaino; to show or make known one's thoughts, i.e. Speak or say.
